author: Michael Standaert
title: Illegal wildlife trade goes online as China shuts down markets
description: Online shift increases pressure on Chinaâ€™s tech giants over trade thrust into spotlight by coronavirus outbreak.
content:
Shenzhen, China - Chinas top e-commerce and express delivery operators are under pressure from the government and wildlife activists to become de facto enforcers of the countrys temporary ban on the trade in wildlife.
